website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive, but sturdy all-bamboo 3-piece set for steaming foods like dim sum, fish, rice, and veggies.
pros: This basic 3-piece bamboo steamer set comes at a nice low price
It is made from 100% bamboo, which may appeal to those concerned with chemicals leaching from plastic or metal parts
cons: Its all-bamboo construction means it won't last forever
Some users complained that it was splintery upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and works well. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and works well. For those needing to prepare a new bamboo steamer before first use, do this: To prepare, scrub with hot, soapy water and rinse thoroughly. Next, submerge in hot water for an hour and rinse. Finally, set it up to steam empty and make sure the basket doesn't touch the boiling water. Steam for 30 minutes and dry overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Too many Bamboo "threads"
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because it looked like it was used before there were spots all over the product. The bottom of the trays are "woven" and not smooth so if you were to cook anything in it I believe that food would be caught in those grooves which would be hard to clean and not to mention all those "bamboo threads" just way too many for me to feel comfortable using and there was a metal wire holding one of the trays together. I'm surprised that they didn't use any of the bamboo threads to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney & Maggie

customer_reviews.title: moldy?
customer_reviews.text: i would probably have really liked this and was really excited to try it. i've been wanting to make dumplings for weeks now. but when it came some of the bamboo on the bed where you would put dumplings was looking moldy. i scraped it with my nail, thinking that maybe i could just wash it, but it wouldn't come off, so its a part of the wood. i will be exchanging it.
customer_reviews.author: nerd_up

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: Lasted only a couple of months. We use steamers often, almost daily, and these just did not hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Fruitsalad87

customer_reviews.title: nice steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I think this steamer because you can use one compartment or all, depending on how many things you are steaming. It is also very very easy to use. I put down parchment paper so that my veggies or whatever I am steaming don't get too into the bamboo. I hand wash after each use, which is kind of a pain especially if you are steaming broccoli and the little pieces get into the wood. But that's why I recommend putting something down underneath them. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: I’m a Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: A perfect solution for storing garlic bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for storing my crop of garlic. They are easy to see one layer at a time, easy to rotate and they are protected from light and heat. It is a lovely and functional kitchen artifact. The extra benefit when the garlic is gone I can use it to steam my vegetables. A must have for for every kitchen
customer_reviews.author: perfectcoffeeseeker

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect steamer for dumplings
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect steamer for dumplings. I do recommend buying the parchment paper that is cut in circles to use with this. Cleanup is a lot easier this way. I use mine, put it back together and let it dry before putting it away.
customer_reviews.author: Kraley

customer_reviews.title: does not fit 10 inch pot
customer_reviews.text: ok the measurement is 10 inches but that is the diameter, the inner part that sits on the pot is 9 1/2 inches so you have to use it on a pot 9 1/2 inches. it will slide off your 10 inch pot. I wouldn't recommend if you have a 10 inch pot like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Artist1

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy slats
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery and packaging, but I found the slats too flimsy. My previous steamer that I had for over 10 yrs had thicker slats, and you can find them at a Chinese market if there is one nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Minkster

customer_reviews.title: Good Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Get a Pot Ring for the Steamer to sit on. The banboo ties get brittle over time, takes a little re-tying occasionally. Get a good scrub brush for cleaning. These are easy to use and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas.H.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not recommending this steamer
customer_reviews.text: At first, it looks great but after 3-4 times of using it started to fall apart. I guess the materials aren’t that sturdy....
customer_reviews.author: Cef

customer_reviews.title: The good thing about this is that it didn't drip the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a large steamer and can steam about 5 baos in one layer. The good thing about this is that it didn't drip the water back into the food. No smell when received.
customer_reviews.author: Jade S

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: It has some red wiring on the edges of the bamboo trays.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Great for steaming
customer_reviews.text: Use a perferated pan underneath and works great for all steaming needs.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo
customer_reviews.text: This has copper wire tightening all sides. Excellent idea for longevity!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Messmer

customer_reviews.title: Had similar before and love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this product. I have not used it yet but Y is what I expected and it arrived well wrapped from factory. Hope to steam lots of vegetables, dim sums, fish in it. Had similar before and love it. Jennifer
customer_reviews.author: j.laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old steamer, and it is exactly the same as my previous steamer. But I was extremely impressed with the care that the company took in packaging it. It was the least expensive steamer that I could find, but it came packaged as if it was the most expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hyer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited to be using this. I love asian foods and this is so neat!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great! My second one
customer_reviews.text: Great! My second one. great for steaming an entire meal at once. As long as you clean them befoire food dries on them they are great. Do not soak!
customer_reviews.author: lorraine may

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice. I put a little water in my wok, set it over the water and steam rice and/or vegetables. I love how the rice comes out. I do have to use a paper liner. Well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.. steams great
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Steams amazing. Fits portions for 2 people. Steams chicken fish and vegetables in 20 minutes and dinner is done
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Fine for your basic bamboo steamer! I’ve only used it once, but it did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R. Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, this is the second time I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, this is the second time I have purchased this, the old one just wore out after many years of good service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hickmott

customer_reviews.title: These have been amazing! I'm considering getting more to stack my steamers ...
customer_reviews.text: These have been amazing! I'm considering getting more to stack my steamers even higher. But for cooking for just me and occasionally a +1, these are fantastic. Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Sherita

customer_reviews.title: Well made traditional steamer
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and construction! I bought 2 for extra capacity.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and put it on the pot,very good
customer_reviews.author: Yan Li

customer_reviews.title: I love making bao and this is not only traditional
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item. I love making bao and this is not only traditional, but VERY effective for steaming 8 bao at a time. Cleans up pretty easy if you think ahead and use a little parchment paper and oil. The baskets have a little bit of a smell to them when they get hot, but that's sort of normal for bamboo cookware I think. Some of the slats on the lid sometimes come untucked but they're pretty easy to tuck back in. All in all, pretty good product and it does what I want it to do well.
customer_reviews.author: CoyoteTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have used this streamer a few times now and I like it so far. My only wish is that one of the levels was taller for tamales.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Steam vegetables and dimsun and use a liner works good
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shuster

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to be able to use but seems very well built and sturdy. Looking forward to putting it through a few tests soon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great cost
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what you want in a bamboo steamer that we use for dumplings mostly. Great product, great cost!

customer_reviews.title: Like any other bamboo steamer I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is a-okay. Like any other bamboo steamer I've ever had. It won't last forever, but then, it's pretty cheap.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Wish there had been instructions on how ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Wish there had been instructions on how to use included.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Good steamer
customer_reviews.text: Decent replacememt for the old bamboo steamer that broke after 20+ years of use.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love the steamer but have noticed mold on the steamer baskets even after drying them

customer_reviews.title: Just worn out and glad to have a duplicate
customer_reviews.text: replaced one I had for more than 30 years. Just worn out and glad to have a duplicate.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 stars but the lid was slightly damaged when we received it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape - really appreciate that there are no plastic or glues used.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good steamer. But the bamboo quality is not good enough. I just give four stars.

customer_reviews.title: Hand made, good quality, healthier bamboo steamer
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo steamer is hand made, so you cannot expect it to be 100% round. But, I'd say this is a good quality product and more healthier than those made with glue. I sooo like this cute baby. Highly recommend it. Will buy again some other day.
customer_reviews.author: ANNIE

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bamboo steamer, I had one back in the 70's and early 80's and used it everyday until it fell apart, looked to replace it for years and could never find one, I am delighted to have a new one now, it is very nice quality and once again I am using it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: YLM

customer_reviews.title: Odd Scent
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several bamboo steamers and this one has a very odd scent to it that infuses the food with an odd flavor. I am not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Louis H Angelli

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I have 9.75 in pan. Fits perfectly. I used it to steam pastrami. Easy clean up, no steaming paper needed.
customer_reviews.author: William Trethewey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and perfect size, great to look at, and heats to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Bamboo Steamer made so Coarse not fine, and there are burr.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality. With good care it should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: No mold or dirt like other reviews state. But does have some wood threads coming off of it. On the seams they are held tight with a copper wire which isn't depicted in the pictures. The sides are slightly not binded well but overall I think it will do well for dumplings. Over all it looks sturdy but I do see some areas where it could warp over time but I believe proper care could help this from happening. Shipped fast and had really cool bubble wrapp it was shipped in. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I thought this bamboo stream basket is going to be a nice display in the kitchen, actually I like it so much that I use it a few times this first week. Build quality and material is better than I expect for the price I pay for.
customer_reviews.author: 2 cents

customer_reviews.title: Took a star away as I needed to “season” it by running it through the steam cycle 10 times for the smell to dissipate
customer_reviews.text: Need to run several steam cycles through before you steam food as there is definitely a smell/taste that does come through when first using. I ran it for 10 steam sessions over a week and now the smell is not so prominent.
customer_reviews.author: meekyung chung

customer_reviews.title: but we’ve taken care of it the same as the others and were disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: We’ve owned several bamboo steamers over the years and never had a problem. This one molded in 3 months. I gave it two stars because it works as advertised, but we’ve taken care of it the same as the others and were disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: PJAzulita

customer_reviews.title: I would consider keeping it if I get a very good discount.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to keep it but the top was unattached to the lid which had its own dome cover so I don't know what this extra cover was for, very flimsy and brittle. It should still be functional, I think, I would consider keeping it if I get a very good discount.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most useful gear for baby food making
customer_reviews.text: The most useful gear for baby food making! I use beets often for it and the red stain comes out pretty quickly. It smells very nice even I have used for a while. I can’t wait to have a little more time to actually cook dimsum from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Corydras

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe I waited so long to buy these. They are so useful in the kitchen and clean up easily. If you steam your food these need to be in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hanshew

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is great and it works just fine. It feels sturdy as well. If I had anything negative to say about it, it's that when I received it, there were some splintering strands of wood. I suppose in that sense, you get what you payed for, but it hasn't had any effect on functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Darrylhi

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: These look and perform exactly like the ones I saw while in Beijing and Shanghai and I was able to make delicious dumplings for me and my family. However, the bamboo started to fray after only one use :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lining the steamer with parchment or cabbage, makes is so easy to use and keep clean. As with anything I use daily/weekly, I don't expect this product to last a long time. I am comfortable with replacing it at least once a year. I do have a metal steamer insert for my pot that I use for steaming fish, lobster, clams etc....
customer_reviews.author: "Cooking is love made visible"

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It is a simple bamboo basket design. Exactly as one would expect. The packaging was crazy good. Not often I am blown away by packaging
customer_reviews.author: username_5

customer_reviews.title: Great product - well made
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made, and exactly as described. I have used it once to steam broccoli - works well, and cleans up easily if you don't allow food to dry in it. I just sprayed it with hot water and dried it in the drainboard. Unlike one I had years ago, there was no noticeable odor when steaming. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Badinov

customer_reviews.title: Great bamboo steamer
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this steamer to replace one exactly like it I used for many years. It arrived in perfect condition & so far I've used it at least 6 times to steam vegetables. I'mvery pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hawks

customer_reviews.title: One of my better buys!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for in a steamer. It has two steaming racks that hold more than expected. I set it over a wok with a few inches of water and used it to steam (1) frozen dim sum and (2) shrimp on the top and fresh veggies on the bottom. The only issue I have is that one of the wooden lattice ties came undone.
customer_reviews.author: DCNative

customer_reviews.title: Classic bamboo steamer, large round shape makes it very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo steamers don't last forever, so every few years I need to replace mine. This one is well made, large and with two steam baskets. Very useful and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I really like this- it fits over my Pampered Chef non stick wok so I can steam with ease. The pieces fit together well.

customer_reviews.title: As you can see made something else
customer_reviews.text: My version of the Firefly table light from a steam cooker
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: A little wonky, especially after the first use, but expected for a handmade item. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: James F. May Sr.

customer_reviews.title: I thoroughly enjoy these bamboo steamers
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoy these bamboo steamers. Stack nicely, great size. The only downside is they tend to mold with high volume.

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Used mine once and it is falling apart already. Was so hopeful about this and wished I could have left a better review

customer_reviews.title: Really makes veggies taste great
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend this to anyone who likes fresh veggies. Toss with olive oil and spices...

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves these! For those wondering she recommends these overtone with the metal rims because those tend to rust! I hope that helps :)

customer_reviews.title: Healthy cooking for the new year!
customer_reviews.text: My new steamer basket, it came as advertised. Have used it TWICE, but there's that lingering odor during steaming and after its been washed, could it be the bamboo? I have only steamed my homemade dim sum and have not tried steaming fish yet. It goes away after its been thoroughly air-dried. I'm hoping the smell goes away the more I use it.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks nicely
customer_reviews.text: My aunt likes the way it cooks. Wish we got a bigger one.

customer_reviews.title: It still works
customer_reviews.text: Well, when I first recieved the basket, part of the lid was popped out. I was able to pop part of that section back into place, but bits of wood broke off. I don’t think it’ll hinder its ability to cook things, though it was a little disheartening to receive it like that
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Have to have
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever boil veggies anymore. Much healthier way of cooking. Easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Treasure found!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for bamboo steamer in the market for a while... so glad I found it on Amazon. It was shipped very fast and the quality is awesome. It is exactly what I am looking for. If you like steam bun or steam dumpling, this is a must to have.

customer_reviews.title: This does not nestle comfortably. I hope that it cooks well

customer_reviews.title: This is a good steamer. I cooked in it

customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Looks very well made and identical to the photo. The parts fit together perfectly. I've used it and it holds up great. And the price is right.

customer_reviews.title: steams all!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these with the stainless steel pot holder and works fantastic! It hasn't bent or warped yet, very sturdy, if you haven't steamed a White Castle burger you are missing out! You'll never nuke it again!!!

customer_reviews.text: Good product. Simple to use and to clean. It has two big compartments and one cover which gives you plenty of room for steaming. Product feel solid. Very competitive price.

product_meta.title: Trademark Innovations 3 Piece Bamboo Steamer, Standard, Tan
product_meta.description: Create tasty dishes while avoiding unhealthy oils by using this 10" bamboo steamer. It comes with a domed lid & 2 levels for Steaming. Hand wash with warm water. By Trademark Innovations.
